name: Alternative thumbnails
description: Adds options to replace video thumbnails using the DeArrow API or image captures from the video.

name: Always allow deep-linking
description: Open Amazon links, even if the app is not set to handle Amazon links.

name: Always repeat
description: Adds an option to always repeat videos when they end.

name: Announcements
description: Adds an option to show announcements from ReVanced on app startup.

name: Auto claim channel points
description: Automatically claim Channel Points.

name: Block audio ads
description: Blocks audio ads in streams and VODs.

name: Block embedded ads
description: Blocks embedded stream ads using services like Luminous or PurpleAdBlocker.

name: Block video ads
description: Blocks video ads in streams and VODs.

name: Bypass URL redirects
description: Adds an option to bypass URL redirects and open the original URL directly.

name: Bypass certificate checks
description: Bypasses certificate checks which prevent YouTube Music from working on Android Auto.

name: Bypass image region restrictions
description: Adds an option to use a different host for user avatar and channel images and can fix missing images that are blocked in some countries.

name: Bypass root checks
description: Removes the restriction to use the app with root permissions or on a custom ROM.

name: Change form factor
description: Adds an option to change the UI appearance to a phone, tablet, or automotive device.

name: Change header
description: Adds an option to change the header logo in the top left corner of the app.

options.title: Custom header logo
options.description:
Folder with images to use as a custom header logo.

The folder must contain one or more of the following folders, depending on the DPI of the device:
- drawable-xxxhdpi
- drawable-xxhdpi
- drawable-xhdpi
- drawable-hdpi
- drawable-mdpi

Each of the folders must contain all of the following files:
- custom_header_light.png
- custom_header_dark.png

The image dimensions must be as follows:
- drawable-xxxhdpi: 512px x 192px
- drawable-xxhdpi: 387px x 144px
- drawable-xhdpi: 258px x 96px
- drawable-hdpi: 194px x 72px
- drawable-mdpi: 129px x 48px

name: Change link sharing domain
description: Replaces the domain name of Twitter links when sharing them.

options.title: Domain name
options.description: The domain name to use when sharing links.

name: Change lyrics provider
description: Changes the lyrics provider to a custom one.

options.title: Lyrics provider host
options.description: The domain name or IP address of a custom lyrics provider.

name: Change package name
description: Appends ".revanced" to the package name by default. Changing the package name of the app can lead to unexpected issues.

options.title: Package name
options.description: The name of the package to rename the app to.

options.title: Update permissions
options.description: Update compatibility receiver permissions. Enabling this can fix installation errors, but this can also break features in certain apps.

options.title: Update providers
options.description: Update provider names declared by the app. Enabling this can fix installation errors, but this can also break features in certain apps.

name: Change start page
description: Adds an option to set which page the app opens in instead of the homepage.

name: Change version code
description: Changes the version code of the app. This will turn off app store updates and allows downgrading an existing app install to an older app version.

options.title: Version code
options.description: The version code to use. Using the highest value turns off app store updates and allows downgrading an existing app install to an older app version.

name: Check watch history domain name resolution
description: Checks if the device DNS server is preventing user watch history from being saved.

name: Copy video URL
description: Adds options to display buttons in the video player to copy video URLs.

name: Custom branding
description: Applies a custom app name and icon. Defaults to "YouTube ReVanced" and the ReVanced logo.

options.title: App name
options.description: The name of the app.

options.title: App icon
options.description:
The icon to apply to the app.

If a path to a folder is provided, the folder must contain the following folders:

- mipmap-xxxhdpi
- mipmap-xxhdpi
- mipmap-xhdpi
- mipmap-hdpi
- mipmap-mdpi

Each of these folders must contain the following files:

- adaptiveproduct_youtube_background_color_108.png
- adaptiveproduct_youtube_foreground_color_108.png
- ic_launcher.png
- ic_launcher_round.png

name: Custom player overlay opacity
description: Adds an option to change the opacity of the video player background when player controls are visible.

name: Custom theme
description: Applies a custom theme (defaults to amoled black)

options.title: Primary background color
options.description: The background color. Can be a hex color or a resource reference.

options.title: Override player gradient color
options.description: Apply primary background color to the player gradient color, which changes dynamically with the song.

options.title: Secondary background color
options.description: The secondary background color. (e.g. playlist list in home, player artist, song credits). Can be a hex color or a resource reference.",

options.title: Accent color
options.description: The accent color ('Spotify green' by default). Can be a hex color or a resource reference.

options.title: Pressed accent color
options.description: The color when accented buttons are pressed, by default slightly darker than accent. Can be a hex color or a resource reference.

name: Debug mode
description: Enables Twitch's internal debugging mode.

name: Disable Ad-Free Banner
description: Disables the banner with a frog, prompting you to buy Tumblr Ad-Free.

name: Disable HDR video
description: Adds an option to disable video HDR.

name: Disable Pairip license check
description: Disables Play Integrity API (Pairip) client-side license check.

name: Disable Sync for Lemmy bottom sheet
description: Disables the bottom sheet at the startup that asks you to signup to "Sync for Lemmy".

name: Disable auto captions
description: Adds an option to disable captions from being automatically enabled.

name: Disable blog notification reminder
description: Disables the reminder to enable notifications for blogs you visit.

name: Disable dashboard ads
description: Disables ads in the dashboard.

name: Disable double tap actions
description: Adds an option to disable player double tap gestures.

name: Disable fullscreen ambient mode
description: Adds an option to disable the ambient mode when in fullscreen.

name: Disable gift message popup
description: Disables the popup suggesting to buy TumblrMart items for other people.

name: Disable haptic feedback
description: Adds an option to disable haptic feedback in the player for various actions.

name: Disable in-app update
description: Disables the in-app update check and update prompt.

name: Disable player popup panels
description: Adds an option to disable panels (such as live chat) from opening automatically.

name: Disable resuming Shorts on startup
description: Adds an option to disable the Shorts player from resuming on app startup when Shorts were last being watched.

name: Disable rolling number animations
description: Adds an option to disable rolling number animations of video view count, user likes, and upload time.

name: Disable screenshot popup
description: Disables the popup that shows up when taking a screenshot.

name: Disable sign in to TV popup
description: Adds an option to disable the popup asking to sign into a TV on the same local network.

name: Disable signature check
description: Disables the signature check that causes the app to crash on startup.

name: Disable telemetry
description: Disables SoundCloud's telemetry system.

name: Disable tracking
description: Disables tracking by replacing tracking URLs with example.com.

name: Disable typing indicator
description: Disables the indicator while typing a message.

name: Downloads
description: Removes download restrictions and changes the default path to download to.

name: Downloads
description: Adds support to download videos with an external downloader app using the in-app download button or a video player action button.

name: Dynamic color
description: Replaces the default X (Formerly Twitter) Blue with the user's Material You palette.

name: Enable Android debugging
description: Enables Android debugging capabilities. This can slow down the app.

name: Enable CustomTabs
description: Enables CustomTabs to open articles in your default browser.

name: Enable DCIM folders backup control
description: Disables always on backup for the Camera and other DCIM folders, allowing you to control backup for each folder individually. This will make the app default to having no folders backed up.

name: Enable ROM signature spoofing
description: Spoofs the signature via the manifest meta-data "fake-signature". This patch only works with ROMs that support signature spoofing.

options.title: Signature or APK file path
options.description: The hex-encoded signature or path to an APK file with the desired signature.

name: Enable debugging
description: Adds options for debugging and exporting ReVanced logs to the clipboard.

name: Enable exclusive audio playback
description: Enables the option to play audio without video.

name: Exit fullscreen mode
description: Adds options to automatically exit fullscreen mode when a video reaches the end.

name: Export all activities
description: Makes all app activities exportable.

name: Export internal data documents provider
description: Exports a documents provider that grants access to the internal data directory of this app to file managers and other apps that support the Storage Access Framework.

name: Feed filter
description: Removes ads, livestreams, stories, image videos and videos with a specific amount of views or likes from the feed.

name: Fix Facebook login
description: Fix logging in with Facebook when the app is patched by always opening the login in a web browser window.

name: Fix Google login
description: Allows logging in with a Google account.

name: Fix login
description: Fixes login for uncertified Mi Fitness app

name: Fix missing audio in video downloads
description: Fixes audio missing in videos downloaded from v.redd.it.

name: Fix old versions
description: Fixes old versions of the app (v33.2 and earlier) breaking due to Tumblr removing remnants of Tumblr Live from the API, which causes many requests to fail. This patch has no effect on newer versions of the app.

name: Fix post thumbnails
description: Fixes loading post thumbnails by correcting their URLs.

name: Fix third party launchers widgets
description: Fixes Spotify widgets not working in third party launchers, like Nova Launcher.

name: Fix video downloads
description: Fixes a bug in Sync's MPD parser resulting in only the audio-track being saved.

name: Force English locale
description: Forces wearable devices to use the English locale.

name: Force original audio
description: Adds an option to always use the original audio track.

name: GmsCore support
description: Allows the app to work without root by using a different package name when patched using a GmsCore instead of Google Play Services.

options.title: GmsCore vendor group ID
options.description: The vendor's group ID for GmsCore.

name: GmsCore support
description: Allows the app to work without root by using a different package name when patched using a GmsCore instead of Google Play Services.

options.title: GmsCore vendor group ID
options.description: The vendor's group ID for GmsCore.

name: GmsCore support
description: Allows the app to work without root by using a different package name when patched using a GmsCore instead of Google Play Services.

options.title: GmsCore vendor group ID
options.description: The vendor's group ID for GmsCore.

name: GmsCore support
description: Allows the app to work without root by using a different package name when patched using a GmsCore instead of Google Play Services.

options.title: GmsCore vendor group ID
options.description: The vendor's group ID for GmsCore.

name: Hex
description: Replaces a hexadecimal patterns of bytes of files in an APK.

options.title: Replacements
options.description:
Hexadecimal patterns to search for and replace with another in a target file.

A pattern is a sequence of case insensitive strings, each representing hexadecimal bytes, separated by spaces.
An example pattern is 'aa 01 02 FF'.

Every pattern must be followed by a pipe ('|'), the replacement pattern,
another pipe ('|'), and the path to the file to make the changes in relative to the APK root. 
The replacement pattern must be shorter or equal in length to the pattern.

Full example of a valid replacement:
'01 02 aa FF|03 04|path/to/file'

name: Hide 'Get Music Premium'
description: Adds an option to hide the "Get Music Premium" label in the settings and account menu.

name: Hide ADB status
description: Hides enabled development settings and/or ADB.

name: Hide Ads
description: Hides ad banners between chats.

name: Hide Create button
description: Hides the "Create" button in the navigation bar.

name: Hide Facebook button
description: Hides the Facebook button in the top toolbar.

name: Hide Shorts components
description: Adds options to hide components related to Shorts.

options.title: Hide Shorts app shortcut
options.description: Permanently hides the shortcut to open Shorts when long pressing the app icon in your launcher.

options.title: Hide Shorts widget
options.description: Permanently hides the launcher widget Shorts button.

name: Hide Stories from Home
description: Hides Stories from the main page, by removing the buttons.

name: Hide ads
description: Hides most of the ads across the app.

name: Hide ads
description: Hide ads and sponsored articles in list pages and remove pre-roll ads on videos.

name: Hide ads
description: Hides all in-app ads.

name: Hide ads
description: Adds options to remove general ads.

name: Hide app icon
description: Hides the app icon from the Android launcher.

name: Hide category bar
description: Adds an option to hide the category bar at the top of the homepage.

name: Hide end screen cards
description: Adds an option to hide suggested video cards at the end of videos.

name: Hide end screen suggested video
description: Adds an option to hide the suggested video at the end of videos.

name: Hide explore feed
description: Hides posts and reels from the explore/search page.

name: Hide inbox ads
description: Hides ads in inbox.

name: Hide inbox subtabs
description: Hides Home and Channels tabs between active now tray and chats.

name: Hide info cards
description: Adds an option to hide info cards that creators add in the video player.

name: Hide layout components
description: Adds options to hide general layout components.

name: Hide mock location
description: Prevents the app from knowing the device location is being mocked by a third party app.

name: Hide music video ads
description: Adds an option to hide ads that appear while listening to or streaming music videos, podcasts, or songs.

name: Hide navigation buttons
description: Hides navigation bar buttons, such as the Reels and Create button.

options.title: Hide Reels
options.description: Permanently hides the Reels button.

options.title: Hide Create
options.description: Permanently hides the Create button.

name: Hide player flyout menu items
description: Adds options to hide menu items that appear when pressing the gear icon in the video player.

name: Hide player overlay buttons
description: Adds options to hide the player Cast, Autoplay, Captions, Previous & Next buttons, and the player control buttons background.

name: Hide purchase reminder
description: Hides the popup that reminds you to purchase the app.

name: Hide related video overlay
description: Adds an option to hide the related video overlay shown when swiping up in fullscreen.

name: Hide story ads
description: Hides the ads in the Facebook app stories.

name: Hide timestamp
description: Adds an option to hide the timestamp in the bottom left of the video player.

name: Hide update popup
description: Prevents the update popup from showing up.

name: Hide upgrade button
description: Hides the upgrade tab from the pivot bar.

name: Hide video action buttons
description: Adds options to hide action buttons (such as the Download button) under videos.

name: Hide view count
description: Hides the view count of Posts.

name: Miniplayer
description: Adds options to change the in-app minimized player.

name: Navigation buttons
description: Adds options to hide and change navigation buttons (such as the Shorts button).

name: Open Shorts in regular player
description: Adds options to open Shorts in the regular video player.

name: Open links externally
description: Adds an option to always open links in your browser instead of the in-app browser.

name: Open links with app chooser
description: Instead of opening links directly, open them with an app chooser. As a result you can select a browser to open the link with.

name: Open videos fullscreen
description: Adds an option to open videos in full screen portrait mode.

name: Override certificate pinning
description: Overrides certificate pinning, allowing to inspect traffic via a proxy.

name: Permanent repeat
description: Adds an option to always repeat even if the playlist ends or another track is played.

name: Playback speed
description: Adds playback speed controls to the video player.

name: Playback speed
description: Enables the playback speed option for all videos and retains the speed configurations in between videos.

name: Playback speed
description: Adds options to customize available playback speeds, set default a playback speed, and show a speed dialog button in the video player.

name: Predictive back gesture
description: Enables the predictive back gesture introduced on Android 13.

name: Promo code unlock
description: Disables the validation of promo code. Any code will work to unlock all features.

name: Remember clear display
description: Remembers the clear display configurations in between videos.

name: Remove 'Sent from' signature
description: Removes the 'Sent from Proton Mail mobile' signature from emails.

name: Remove Google Play Integrity check
description: Removes the Google Play Integrity check. With this it's possible to use SwissID on custom ROMS.If the device is rooted, root permissions must be hidden from the app.

name: Remove Meta AI
description: Removes UI elements related to Meta AI.

name: Remove background playback restrictions
description: Removes restrictions on background playback, including playing kids videos in the background.

name: Remove background playback restrictions
description: Removes restrictions on background playback, including playing kids videos in the background.

name: Remove badge tab
description: Removes the badge tab from the activity tab.

name: Remove bootloader detection
description: Removes the check for an unlocked bootloader.

name: Remove broadcasts restriction
description: Enables starting/stopping NetGuard via broadcasts.

name: Remove device restrictions
description: Removes restrictions from using the app on any device. Requires mounting patched app over original.

name: Remove file size limit
description: Allows opening files larger than 2 MB in the text editor.

name: Remove free accounts limit
description: Removes the limit for maximum free accounts logged in.

name: Remove notification badge
description: Removes the red notification badge from the activity tab.

name: Remove play limits
description: Disables purchase nagging and playback limits of not purchased tracks.

name: Remove root detection
description: Removes the check for root permissions.

name: Remove root detection
description: Removes the check for root permissions and unlocked bootloader.

name: Remove root detection
description: Removes the check for root permissions.

name: Remove root detection
description: Removes the check for root permissions and unlocked bootloader.

name: Remove screen capture restriction
description: Removes the restriction of capturing audio from apps that normally wouldn't allow it.

name: Remove screenshot restriction
description: Removes the restriction of taking screenshots in apps that normally wouldn't allow it.

name: Remove share targets
description: Removes share targets like directly sharing to a frequent contact.

name: Remove tracking query parameter
description: Adds an option to remove the tracking parameter from links you share.

name: Remove viewer discretion dialog
description: Adds an option to remove the dialog that appears when opening a video that has been age-restricted by accepting it automatically. This does not bypass the age restriction.

name: Rename shared permissions
description: Rename certain permissions shared across Amazon apps. Applying this patch can fix installation errors, but can also break features in certain apps.

name: Return YouTube Dislike
description: Adds an option to show the dislike count of videos with Return YouTube Dislike.

name: SIM spoof
description: Spoofs the information which is retrieved from the SIM card.

name: Sanitize sharing links
description: Removes (tracking) query parameters from the URLs when sharing links.

name: Sanitize sharing links
description: Removes the tracking query parameters from links before they are shared.

name: Sanitize sharing links
description: Removes the tracking query parameters from links before they are shared.

name: Seekbar
description: Adds options to disable precise seeking when swiping up on the seekbar, slide to seek instead of playing at 2x speed when pressing and holding, tapping the player seekbar to seek, and hiding the video player seekbar.

name: Set target SDK version 34
description: Changes the target SDK to version 34 (Android 14). For devices running Android 15+, this will disable edge-to-edge display.

name: Settings
description: Adds ReVanced settings to TikTok.

name: Settings
description: Adds settings menu to Twitch.

name: Shorts autoplay
description: Adds options to automatically play the next Short.

name: Show deleted messages
description: Shows deleted chat messages behind a clickable spoiler.

name: Show on lockscreen
description: Shows student id and student ticket on lockscreen.

name: Show seekbar
description: Shows progress bar for all video.

name: Skip ads
description: Automatically skips video stream ads.

name: SponsorBlock
description: Adds options to enable and configure SponsorBlock, which can skip undesired video segments such as sponsored content.

name: Spoof Android device ID
description: Spoofs the Android device ID used by the app for account authentication.This can be used to copy the account to another device.

options.title: Android device ID
options.description: The Android device ID to spoof to.

name: Spoof SIM country
description: Spoofs country information returned by the SIM card provider.

options.title: Network ISO country code
options.description: ISO-3166-1 alpha-2 country code equivalent for the SIM provider's country code.

options.title: SIM ISO country code
options.description: ISO-3166-1 alpha-2 country code equivalent for the SIM provider's country code.

name: Spoof Wi-Fi connection
description: Spoofs an existing Wi-Fi connection.

name: Spoof app version
description: Adds an option to trick YouTube into thinking you are running an older version of the app. This can be used to restore old UI elements and features.

name: Spoof build info
description: Spoofs the information about the current build.

options.title: Board
options.description: The name of the underlying board, like "goldfish".

options.title: Bootloader
options.description: The system bootloader version number.

options.title: Brand
options.description: The consumer-visible brand with which the product/hardware will be associated, if any.

options.title: CPU ABI
options.description: This field was deprecated in API level 21. Use SUPPORTED_ABIS instead.

options.title: CPU ABI 2
options.description: This field was deprecated in API level 21. Use SUPPORTED_ABIS instead.

options.title: Device
options.description: The name of the industrial design.

options.title: Display
options.description: A build ID string meant for displaying to the user.

options.title: Fingerprint
options.description: A string that uniquely identifies this build.

options.title: Hardware
options.description: The name of the hardware (from the kernel command line or /proc).

options.title: Host
options.description: The host.

options.title: ID
options.description: Either a changelist number, or a label like "M4-rc20".

options.title: Manufacturer
options.description: The manufacturer of the product/hardware.

options.title: Model
options.description: The end-user-visible name for the end product.

options.title: ODM SKU
options.description: The SKU of the device as set by the original design manufacturer (ODM).

options.title: Product
options.description: The name of the overall product.

options.title: Radio
options.description: This field was deprecated in API level 15. The radio firmware version is frequently not available when this class is initialized, leading to a blank or "unknown" value for this string. Use getRadioVersion() instead.

options.title: Serial
options.description: This field was deprecated in API level 26. Use getSerial() instead.

options.title: SKU
options.description: The SKU of the hardware (from the kernel command line).

options.title: SOC manufacturer
options.description: The manufacturer of the device's primary system-on-chip.

options.title: SOC model
options.description: The model name of the device's primary system-on-chip.

options.title: Tags
options.description: Comma-separated tags describing the build, like "unsigned,debug".

options.title: Time
options.description: The time at which the build was produced, given in milliseconds since the UNIX epoch.

options.title: Type
options.description: The type of build, like "user" or "eng".

options.title: User
options.description: The user.

name: Spoof certificate
description: Spoofs the X-Android-Cert header to allow push messages.

name: Spoof client
description: Restores functionality of the app by using custom client ID.

description: Restores functionality of the app by using custom client ID.

description: Restores functionality of the app by using custom client ID.

description: Restores functionality of the app by using custom client ID.

description: Restores functionality of the app by using custom client ID.

description: Restores functionality of the app by using custom client ID.

description: Restores functionality of the app by using custom client ID.

name: Spoof client
description: Restores functionality of the app by using custom client ID.

name: Spoof device ID
description: Spoofs device ID to mitigate manual bans by developers.

name: Spoof device dimensions
description: Adds an option to spoof the device dimensions which can unlock higher video qualities.

name: Spoof features
description: Spoofs the device to enable Google Pixel exclusive features, including unlimited storage.

options.title: Features to enable
options.description: Google Pixel exclusive features to enable. Features up to Pixel XL enable the unlimited storage feature.

options.title: Features to disable
options.description: Google Pixel exclusive features to disable.Features after Pixel XL may have to be disabled for unlimited storage depending on the device.

name: Spoof signature
description: Spoofs the signature of the app.

name: Spoof video streams
description: Adds options to spoof the client video streams to fix playback.

name: Spoof video streams
description: Adds options to spoof the client video streams to fix playback.

name: Swipe controls
description: Adds options to enable and configure volume and brightness swipe controls.

name: Theme
description: Adds options for theming and applies a custom background theme (dark background theme defaults to amoled black).

options.title: Dark theme background color
options.description: Can be a hex color (#AARRGGBB) or a color resource reference.

options.title: Light theme background color
options.description: Can be a hex color (#AARRGGBB) or a color resource reference.

name: Unlock Premium icons
description: Unlocks the Reddit Premium icons.

name: Unlock downloads
description: Unlocks the ability to download any video. GIFs can be downloaded via the menu on long press.

name: Unlock subscription
description: Unlocks the subscription feature but requires a custom client ID.

name: Unlock subscription features
description: Unlocks "Routes", "Matched Runs" and "Segment Efforts".

name: Unlock themes
description: Unlocks all themes that are inaccessible until a certain level is reached.

name: Use /user/ endpoint
description: Replaces the deprecated endpoint for viewing user profiles /u with /user, that used to fix a bug.

name: Video ads
description: Adds an option to remove ads in the video player.

name: Video quality
description: Adds options to use the advanced video quality menu and set default video qualities.

name: Wide search bar
description: Adds an option to replace the search icon with a wide search bar. This will hide the YouTube logo when active.
